name: photo-compare-sort
description: A photo sort by user comparation
readme:
# photo-compare-sort
GUI application to sort photos by comparing you prefer

This is a prototype. Please, if the idea please to you and can help you, write to me ! And welcome if you want to participate (ie UI better user experience)

```bash
  npm install
  node_modules/.bin/electron .
```

Concept
-------

- First, choose the directory
- Then, you can zoom and move the zoomed part to think about croping possibility (the picture can be bad but can be better with croping or "post production" (light, colors, etc)

![Sort zoom](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/avighier/photo-compare-sort/3f6f3cb3b908c9f0dd3d39af284c956c80cace7e/build/zoom1.jpg "Sort zoom")

![Sort zoom](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/avighier/photo-compare-sort/3f6f3cb3b908c9f0dd3d39af284c956c80cace7e/build/zoom2.jpg "Sort zoom")

- Then, select for each proposition the picture you prefer

![Sort view](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/avighier/photo-compare-sort/3f6f3cb3b908c9f0dd3d39af284c956c80cace7e/build/sort.jpg "Sort view")

- Finally, you will see your photos sorted by your preferences
 
![Show view](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/avighier/photo-compare-sort/3f6f3cb3b908c9f0dd3d39af284c956c80cace7e/build/show.jpg "Show view")

Todo
----

- Verify it resolves (help me) my problems : keep only the best photos for a subject
- read RAW, and apply filters (RAW or JPG)
- Utilisation du composant https://fengyuanchen.github.io/viewer/ pour plus de souplesse ?
- Add shortcuts
- Change prototype to dev : refactoring
